column2: location=In a cave in the [[Misty Mountains]], deep below [[Goblin-town]]

column1: '''Gollum's Lake''' was a small subterranean body of icy cold water inside the [[Misty Mountains]]. The lake had a tiny island in the middle, which provided protection for [[Gollum]] from the nearby [[Goblin-town
column2: Goblin camp]] and was where he lived for over four hundred years during the [[Third Age]]<ref name=Riddles>{{H
column3: Riddles}}</ref> (Gollum entered the Misty Mountains about {{TA
column6: n}}; how long it took him to find the lake is unknown).<ref>{{App
column7: TA}}</ref> The lake harboured [[fish]], which was the main food source of Gollum.<ref name=Riddles/>
